function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased urban densification and obstructed views","category":"Urbanization challenges","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Changes in privacy and individual space due to covid-19","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cultural and contextual differences in study locations","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of public health regulations","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Urban densification leading to concentration of apartment housing in urban centers","category":"Urbanization challenges","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Historical examples of poor housing design leading to disease transmission","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Domestic travel ban to prevent the spread of the virus between regions.","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Imposition of curfews to limit movement and reduce person-to-person contact during peak transmission times.","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of religious pilgrimage and closure of public venues","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legislative limitations affecting bacs improvements","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Legislative constraints prevent the storage of locally produced electricity, leading to suboptimal consumption.","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of national or international guidelines for hcho and tvoc parameters","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exclusion of weekends and public holidays from compliance metrics","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited information about covariables such as health services, epidemiological traits, and population movement hinders the assessment of the relative importance of air pollution among socio-environmental driving factors of covid-19 infections.","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of inter-institutional collaboration","category":"Lack of coordination and standardization among institutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of inter-sectoral collaboration and government agreements for covid-19 control policies","category":"Lack of coordination and standardization among institutions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequacies in global governance structure","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Governance efficiency and quality being put to the test during the pandemic.","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Language limitation to english","category":"Global coordination challenges","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Demand for regular lockdowns to manage environmental risks in countries like qatar","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Claims of covid-19 being a manufactured virus","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Controversial debate on the origin of covid-19 natural mutant vs bio-engineered","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exploitation of national crises to push through unpopular and extreme measures on the environment and labour rights","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequitable governance approaches leading to restricted access to safe spaces for physical activity and urban resources for certain communities.","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential discrimination and harm resulting from the application of lockdown measures in a standardization among institutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective risk-containment strategies at the community level","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreased immigration and emigration of previous immigrants","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Initial increase in unemployment among refugees during the first lockdown in 2020","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Simultaneous increase in immigrant unemployment in multiple countries","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Emigration of immigrants from certain european oecd countries","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and standardization among institutions and organizations may lead to fragmented and inconsistent approaches to malaria control.","category":"Lack of coordination and standardization among institutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific actions in the nua regarding health and the built environment","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Sharing proper techniques for installation and appropriate materials for piping to ensure long lifespan and minimal need for repair.","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Data paucity for actionable insights on the magnitude and complexity of malaria risk malaria problem, particularly in the context of climate change and urbanization.","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Governmental regulation banning the use of mechanisms","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of attention to official governmental media","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on
